foreignData.name: Lavaklauen-Gebiet
foreignData.text:
Das Lavaklauen-Gebiet kommt getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {B} oder {R}.
{1}{B}{R}: Bis zum Ende des Zuges wird das Lavaklauen-Gebiet zu einer 2/2 schwarzen und roten Elementarwesen-Kreatur mit „{X}: Diese Kreatur erhält +X/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges." Es ist immer noch ein Land.

foreignData.name: Alturas Garras de Lava
foreignData.text:
Las Alturas Garras de Lava entran al campo de batalla giradas.
{T}: Agrega {B} o {R} a tu reserva de maná.
{1}{B}{R}: Hasta el final del turno, las Alturas Garras de Lava son una criatura Elemental negra y roja 2/2 con "{X}: Esta criatura obtiene +X/+0 hasta el final del turno". Sigue siendo una tierra.

foreignData.name: Étendues de Griffelave
foreignData.text:
Les Étendues de Griffelave arrivent sur le champ de bataille engagées.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {R} à votre réserve.
{1}{B}{R} : Jusqu'à la fin du tour, les Étendues de Griffelave deviennent une créature 2/2 noire et rouge Élémental avec « {X} : Cette créature gagne +X/+0 jusqu'à la fin du tour. » C'est toujours un terrain.

foreignData.name: Alture di Graffio di Lava
foreignData.text:
Le Alture di Graffio di Lava entrano nel campo di battaglia TAPpate.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o {R} alla tua riserva di mana.
{1}{B}{R}: Fino alla fine del turno, le Alture di Graffio di Lava diventano una creatura Elementale 2/2 nera e rossa con "{X}: Questa creatura prende +X/+0 fino alla fine del turno". È ancora una terra.

foreignData.name: 溶岩爪の辺境
foreignData.text:
溶岩爪の辺境はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{B}か{R}を加える。
{1}{B}{R}：ターン終了時まで、溶岩爪の辺境は「{X}：このクリーチャーはターン終了時まで＋Ｘ/＋０の修整を受ける。」を持つ黒であり赤である２/２のエレメンタル･クリーチャーになる。 それは土地でもある。

foreignData.name: Regiões de Garras-de-Lava
foreignData.text:
Regiões de Garras-de-Lava entra no campo de batalha virado.
{T}: Adicione {B} ou {R} à sua reserva de mana.
{1}{B}{R}: Até o final do turno, Regiões de Garras-de-Lava torna-se uma criatura preta e vermelha 2/2 do tipo Elemental com "{X}: Esta criatura recebe +X/+0 até o final do turno." Ela ainda conta como um terreno.

foreignData.name: Просторы Лавового Когтя
foreignData.text:
Просторы Лавового Когтя выходят на поле битвы повернутыми.
{T}: добавьте {B} или {R} в ваше хранилище маны.
{1}{B}{R}: до конца хода Просторы Лавового Когтя становятся существом 2/2 черный и красный Элементаль со способностью «{X}: это существо получает +X/+0 до конца хода». При этом они остаются землей.

foreignData.name: 岩浆爪流域
foreignData.text:
岩浆爪流域须横置进战场。
{T}：加{B}或{R}到你的法术力池中。
{1}{B}{R}：直到回合结束，岩浆爪流域成为2/2黑红双色的元素生物，并具有「{X}：此生物得+X/+0直到回合结束。」 它仍然是地。

name: Lavaclaw Reaches
originalText:
Lavaclaw Reaches enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
{1}{B}{R}: Until end of turn, Lavaclaw Reaches becomes a 2/2 black and red Elemental creature with "{X}: This creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn." It's still a land.

rulings.text: A land that becomes a creature may be affected by “summoning sickness.” You can’t attack with it or use any of its {T} abilities (including its mana abilities) unless it began your most recent turn on the battlefield under your control. Note that summoning sickness cares about when that permanent came under your control, not when it became a creature.

When a land becomes a creature, that doesn’t count as having a creature enter the battlefield. The permanent was already on the battlefield; it only changed its types. Abilities that trigger whenever a creature enters the battlefield won’t trigger.

text:
Lavaclaw Reaches enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
{1}{B}{R}: Until end of turn, Lavaclaw Reaches becomes a 2/2 black and red Elemental creature with "{X}: This creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn." It's still a land.
